name: Onewe
description: '''Onewe''' ({{Korean|hangul=원위|rr=Wonwi}}; stylized in [[all caps]]; {{IPA|ko|wʌnˌwi|pron}}) is a South Korean [[alternative rock]] band composed of five members: Yonghoon, Harin, Kanghyun, Dongmyeong and [[Giuk]] (formerly known as CyA). The members originally formed under the name '''M.A.S 0094 (Make a Sound 0094)'''. They released their first single "Butterfly, Find a Flower" on August 13, 2015 under Modern Music. In April 2017, they moved to [[RBW (company)|RBW]] and were renamed '''MAS'''. In June 2018, it was announced that the band would redebut under the new name Onewe. The band officially made its re-debut on May 13, 2019, with their first single album ''[[1/4 (single album)|1/4]]''.
